publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3663 Mary Mulligan: BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009—That the Parliament recognises 18 March 2009 as British Sign Language (BSL) Recognition Day; commends Donaldson’s school in Linlithgow for its role as Scotland’s national school for children who are deaf or have severe speech and language difficulties; recognises the dedication of the staff in teaching BSL, which helps pupils transition into the community; encourages all local authorities to consider the range and quality of resources that Donaldson’s offers and how they could be used to benefit children and young people from their areas, and calls on the Scottish Government to continue to support the school in its vital role in Scotland.
S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) Robert Brown*, Jackie Baillie*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Butler*, Elaine Murray*, Mary Scanlon*, Jackson Carlaw*, George Foulkes*, John Park*, Johann Lamont*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Peattie*, David Whitton*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Karen Whitefield*, Mike Pringle*, Hugh Henry*, Patricia Ferguson*, Marilyn Livingstone*

S3M-3663 Mary Mulligan: BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009—That the Parliament recognises 18 March 2009 as British Sign Language (BSL) Recognition Day; commends Donaldson’s school in Linlithgow for its role as Scotland’s national school for children who are deaf or have severe speech and language difficulties; recognises the dedication of the staff in teaching BSL, which helps pupils transition into the community; encourages all local authorities to consider the range and quality of resources that Donaldson’s offers and how they could be used to benefit children and young people from their areas, and calls on the Scottish Government to continue to support the school in its vital role in Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Robert Brown, Jackie Baillie, Jamie McGrigor, Bill Butler, Elaine Murray, Mary Scanlon, Jackson Carlaw, George Foulkes, John Park, Johann Lamont, Trish Godman, Cathy Peattie, David Whitton, Robin Harper, Bill Kidd, Patrick Harvie, Hugh O’Donnell, Karen Whitefield, Mike Pringle, Hugh Henry, Patricia Ferguson, Marilyn Livingstone, Margaret Mitchell*, Marlyn Glen*, Ken Macintosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Pauline McNeill*, Gil Paterson*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) Alison McInnes*
S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) David Stewart*, Irene Oldfather*
S3M-3663 BSL Recognition Day - 18 March 2009 (lodged on 10 March 2009) Rhoda Grant*
